Package dev.majek.advancements

Interface Advancement

public interface Advancement
Custom advancement.
Since:
1.0.0

    Advancement.Builder
    Advancement builder for additional configuration options.

  • Method Details

    • builder

      @NotNull static Advancement.Builder builder(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.NamespacedKey key, @NotNull @NotNull ItemObject icon, @NotNull @NotNull net.kyori.adventure.text.Component title, @NotNull @NotNull net.kyori.adventure.text.Component description, @NotNull @NotNull Map<@NotNull String,@NotNull Trigger> triggers)
      Build a new custom advancement.
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the advancement, which determines the file location
      icon - the item to display in the advancement tab, the root advancement's icon is the icon of the tab
      title - the title of the advancement
      description - the description of the advancement
      triggers - the map of triggers that will cause the advancement to complete
      Returns:
      a new advancement builder
      Since:
      1.0.0
      See Also:
      • see this to learn how to use triggers
      • see this to learn how to use item objects for the icon

    • key

      @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.NamespacedKey key()
      Get the key of the advancement. All advancement keys are unique.
      Returns:
      the key
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • icon

      @NotNull @NotNull ItemObject icon()
      Get the item object of the advancement. This is the item shown in the advancements tab.
      Returns:
      the icon
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • title

      @NotNull @NotNull net.kyori.adventure.text.Component title()
      Get the title of the advancement. This is the name shown in chat and in the advancements tab.
      Returns:
      the title
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • description

      @NotNull @NotNull net.kyori.adventure.text.Component description()
      Get the description of the advancement.
      Returns:
      the description
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • triggers

      @NotNull @NotNull Map<@NotNull String,@NotNull Trigger> triggers()
      Get the map of triggers for the advancement. These are things that can cause the advancement to complete.
      Returns:
      the triggers
      Since:
      1.0.0
      See Also:
      • requirements()

    • requirements

      @NotNull @NotNull Set<@NotNull String[]> requirements()
      Get the requirements for the advancement. These are strings which are the ids of triggers. Items in the set are separated by logical ANDs and items in the array are separated by logical ORs.
      Returns:
      the requirements
      Since:
      1.0.0
      See Also:
      • triggers()

    • parent

      @Nullable @Nullable org.bukkit.NamespacedKey parent()
      Get the parent of this advancement, if there is one.
      Returns:
      the parent
      Since:
      1.0.0

      @Nullable @Nullable String background()
      Get the background of this advancement, if there is one.

      Since:

      Returns:

      @NotNull @NotNull Frame frame()

    • toast

      boolean toast()
      Whether there will be a popup notification in the top right on advancement completion.
      Returns:
      whether to toast completion
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • announce

      boolean announce()
      Whether the advancement completion should be announced in chat to all players.
      Returns:
      whether to announce
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • hidden

      boolean hidden()
      Whether the child advancement is hidden until the parent is completed.
      Returns:
      whether to hide child
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • toJson

      @NotNull @NotNull String toJson()
      Get the Json representation of the advancement that will be stored in the server files.
      Returns:
      the advancement's json
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • activate

      boolean activate(boolean reloadBukkitData)
      Load the advancement onto the server and into storage.
      Parameters:
      reloadBukkitData - whether to reload bukkit data (if you're registering a lot of advancements you should reload bukkit data once afterwards)
      Returns:
      whether advancement activation was successful
      Since:
      1.0.0
      See Also:
      • this is how to reload the data once afterwards
